message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.DL. 

The paper deals with the problem of recommendation systems, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of matrix factorization and vector representation of words suggests that the paper may also belong to the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves natural language processing techniques, which falls under the subfield of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of short item descriptions and the need to approximate similarity between items suggests that the paper may also belong to the subfield of similarity and distance metrics (cs.SI). Finally, the use of embedding techniques suggests that the paper may also belong to the subfield of deep learning (cs.DL).
